main.name: Jonathan Gan
main.description: I am a Full Stack React and React Native Developer with and interest in Blockchain and Mobile Application Development
main.bio: I love to use Javascript and React Native to Develop amazing Technologies. I also write medium articles @cryptocurrensea
main.contactmessage: If you have any software needs, feel free to reach out and even if I can't assist you I can connect you with someone who can!

resume.skillmessage: I am most skilled in Javascript ES6 / React + React Native with expirience in C/C++/Objective-C, Swift, Mongodb, Azure, AWS, Heroku, UX/UI, and SCRUM

education.description: I currently am enrolled for a Bachelors Degree in Computer Engineering with a concentration in Machine Intelligence
I do online courses for cirtifications that can be seen on my Linkedin
